ygData.subject: Layered Maps
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.  I just thought of a brilliant idea for maps.  How about layered maps?  It would work by every 10-30 seconds, one of the map tiles would be pealed away

Hmm.  I just thought of a brilliant idea for maps.  How about layered
maps?  It would work by every 10-30 seconds, one of the map tiles
would be 'pealed' away and whatever map tile is in that exact spot on
the layer below it would appear.  This would add a new element of
chaos and time-consciousness to playing every scenario.

* * *

Ok, I've been thinking a little too hard on how to create a scenario
full of pure chaos.  But considering how much I love
structure/control, that's a good thing.  The idea of anything anything
can happen while playing a scenario breaks down the whole barrier of
the game becoming boring and unpredictable after a while.
